member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_SRV
member.summary: Specifies the subresource from a cube texture to use in a shader-resource view.

member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_SRV.MostDetailedMip
member.summary: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is between 0 and MipLevels -1.

member.name: D3D10_TEXCUBE_SRV.MipLevels
member.summary: Number of mipmap levels to use.
